explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a dark jacket and a little girl are playing on a pink and purple seesaw on the grass in a park. The man is standing on the lower end of the seesaw with his hands on it, and the girl is sitting on the higher end. There is another seesaw beside them, and a slide behind them. The background is trees and a wall.

[0-3] The man presses the seesaw up and down, and the girl swings up and down on the other end of the seesaw. The camera zooms in on the little girl as she swings up and down happily. The camera cuts to the man, who is still pressing the seesaw up and down.
